statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Fairfield pulls away from Marist 60-54

images.name: 1H FAIR T. Nelson made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by K. Rose.
images.caption: 1H (9:29) FAIR Tyler Nelson made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by K.J. Rose.

article.story: FAIRFIELD, Conn. -- Marcus Gilbert scored 15 points, Tyler Nelson added 14 and Fairfield out-scored Marist 14-9 in the final five minutes on Friday for a 60-54 win. The Stags (6-11, 4-3 Mid-Atlantic Athletic Conference) were leading 46-45 when Marcus Gilbert made a free throw with 5:02 to play. Marist then missed three 3-pointers, an inside attempt and had a turnover on its next three possessions while K.J. Rose and Tyler Nelson scored to put Fairfield up 51-45 at 3:19. Chavaughn Lewis, who led the Red Foxes (1-16, 0-6) with 22 points, ended a near four-minute drought with a layup but Marist remained cold while Steve Johnson and Nelson combined to go 8-8 from the foul line in the final minute to secure the win. Fairfield finished 27 of 36 from the line while Marist was 12 of 15 in losing its 12th straight. T.J. Curry added 11 points for Marist.
